name: Uncomplicated Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
chief_complaint: It burns when I pee, and I feel like I have to go all the time

lab_results.urinalysis: positive for leukocyte esterase and nitrites

prognosis: Excellent with prompt treatment; symptoms typically resolve within 2-3 days
description: A bacterial infection of the lower urinary tract, typically caused by E. coli ascending from the perineum. Most common in sexually active women due to shorter urethral length.
